channel.title: Changing npc def - zdr based server
channel.description:
anyone know how to change npc def becuz its rly hard to hit npc's even if ur like 90+ att. Also for new players its almost impossible to hit a man........
Actually i think its just that melee hits are low.. becuz range and mage hits npc's normally. So how do i change how hard melee hits on npc's?

item.title: Changing npc def - zdr based server
item.dc:creator: @fury_upon_u fury upon u
item.description:
@fury_upon_u wrote:

nope… =[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2008, 05:35:47 pm[/size][hr]Srry for double post but this is annoying… Like i hit 0s with melee on monsters that i should hit really easy… Range and mage hit better on npcs,but still hit 0s on monsters that i shouldn’t hit 0s on that much.

Anyone know whats making melee,range,and mage have such low accuracy on npcs?
Btw they work ok in the wild tho.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing npc def - zdr based server

item.title: Changing npc def - zdr based server
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

Go in NPC.cfg
and change their combat level to lower.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing npc def - zdr based server
